claim: Paul Thomas Anderson directed a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After he attended the Sundance Institute , Anderson had a deal with Rysher Entertainment to direct his first feature film , a neo-noir crime thriller titled Hard Eight , in 1996 .

claim: Paul Thomas Anderson directed a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Cigarettes & Coffee is a 1993 short film written and directed by Paul Thomas Anderson starring Philip Baker Hall .

claim: Paul Thomas Anderson directed a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Under a joint venture with Constantin , Bolt has also produced 2004 's Resident Evil : Apocalypse  (  written by Anderson and directed by Alexander Witt  )  , the psychological horror The Dark  (  directed by John Fawcett  )  , teen actioner DOA : Dead or Alive  (  directed by Cory Yuen for Dimension Films  )  , an adaptation of Tecmo 's best-selling video game franchise , and the third movie in the Resident Evil franchise , 2007 's Resident Evil : Extinction that debuted in the # 1 US box office position and grossed $ 150M worldwide .
